title: Selle Italia Flite Boost Superflow saddle gets lightweight Pro Team Kit Carbonio upgrade
content:
Following a win in its racing debut over the weekend at Strade Bianche, Selle Italia opens up a new update of their modern flagship saddle, a lightweight pro version of the Flite Boost that brings more adjustability to the masses. The new saddle even vies for the title of their longest product name yet… the […]

The post Selle Italia Flite Boost Superflow saddle gets lightweight Pro Team Kit Carbonio upgrade appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
